revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Alvarion |model=Networking Gateway |revision=(NG-4D1W) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2005 |fcc_date=09/29/2004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=WIC128 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=CPE, wireless router |fcc_id=PBLWL531M |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=AMRISC |cpu1_model=10000 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV800AT-70TC |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5160L16-7TC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AMIT WL531M |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2560 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.254.243 |default_user= |default_pass=private |oui=00:03:40 |oui_eth=00:03:40 }} [http://gourmetgraffiti.wordpress.com/2007/09/18/alvarion-networking-gatewayrouter-ng-4d1w/ Blog post w/ manual]
It appears this unit is designed to function as a an indoor router connected to an outdoor uplink (ODU). :The ODU port on the device provides power via PoE (55V) to the outdoor unit.
Per '''Alvarion''''s manual.. *there are two access modes via the web UI **admin: password is '''private''' **user: password is '''public''' *the default SSID is '''default''' *the USB port on the unit will allow the device to function as a print server
Addl. specifications.. *Dimensions (W x H x D): [[Dimensions::190.5 mm x 26.2 mm x 111 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::620 g]]
Presumed 00:03:40 OUI for both interfaces (00:03:40:A7 - 00:03:40:A8 MAC range?)..
